title: A Guide to Using animalsounds
code: library(animalsounds)  animal_sounds("dog", "woof") #> [1] "The dog goes woof! You wazzock."

what: If sound is not entered, default behaviour is this:
title: A Guide to Using animalsounds
code: library(animalsounds)  animal_sounds("slug") #> [1] "The slug doesn't make a sound. You twit."

what: Specifying seed allows for reproducible insults
title: A Guide to Using animalsounds
code: library(animalsounds)  animal_sounds("giraffe", "who knows", seed=500) #> [1] "The giraffe goes who knows! You silly-billy."

title: Authors and Citation
text: Donnellan E (2025). animalsounds: Tells Animal Noises, Insults Mildly. R package version 0.0.0.9000, https://github.com/eddonnellan/animalsounds.

what: Tells You Animal Noises, Then Insults You Mildly
title: Tells You Animal Noises, Then Insults You Mildly
text: animalsounds takes animal description noise input. Prints sentence, along randomly selected mild insult.

title: Tells You Animal Noises, Then Insults You Mildly
text: can install development version animalsounds GitHub :

title: Tells You Animal Noises, Then Insults You Mildly
code: library(animalsounds) animal_sounds("dog", "woof") #> [1] "The dog goes woof! You muppet." animal_sounds("chimp", "hooo hooo wah-hu-wah-hu-wah-hu-wah-hu-wah-hu waaaaargh waaaaargh hu hu hu") #> [1] "The chimp goes hooo hooo wah-hu-wah-hu-wah-hu-wah-hu-wah-hu waaaaargh waaaaargh hu hu hu! You twit."

what: Print an animal's sounds and a random gentle insult — animal_sounds
title: Print an animal's sounds and a random gentle insult — animal_sounds
text: Wraps paste0() sample(). Use set.seed() reproducible insults.

title: Print an animal's sounds and a random gentle insult — animal_sounds
Print an animal's sounds and a random gentle insult — animal_sounds
code: animal_sounds("dog", "woof") #> [1] "The dog goes woof! You twit." animal_sounds("chimp", "hooo hooo wah-hu-wah-hu-wah-hu-wah-hu-wah-hu waaaaargh waaaaargh hu hu hu") #> [1] "The chimp goes hooo hooo wah-hu-wah-hu-wah-hu-wah-hu-wah-hu waaaaargh waaaaargh hu hu hu! You twit."
